video.title: Narcos
video.synopsis: The true story of Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels fuels this gritty gangster drama series.

episodes.synopsis: Chilean drug chemist Cockroach brings his product to Colombian smuggler Pablo Escobar. DEA agent Steve Murphy joins the war on drugs in Bogotá.
episodes.title: Descenso

episodes.synopsis: Communist radical group M-19 makes a move against the narcos, while Murphy gets an education in Colombian law enforcement from his new partner Peña.
episodes.title: The Sword of Simón Bolívar

episodes.synopsis: Murphy encounters the depths of government corruption when he and Peña try to derail Escobar's political ambitions by proving he's a narco.
episodes.title: The Men of Always

episodes.synopsis: Despite a new extradition treaty, the U.S. puts more money into fighting communism, creating new challenges for Murphy and Peña in the hunt for Pablo.
episodes.title: The Palace in Flames

episodes.synopsis: Pablo's extreme methods put the narcos on the brink of war with Carrillo and the government. Peña tries to protect his witness, Elisa.
episodes.title: There Will Be a Future

episodes.synopsis: Peña and Carrillo close in on Gacha, while Murphy tries to protect pro-extradition candidate Gaviria from a notorious assassin connected to Pablo.
episodes.title: Explosivos

episodes.synopsis: Pablo goes into hiding as the political tide turns against him, but he finds a way to strike back. Murphy and Peña finally get the CIA to help them.
episodes.title: You Will Cry Tears of Blood

episodes.synopsis: A tragic mistake forces the government to change tactics in the fight against Pablo. But Pablo faces bigger threats from inside his empire.
episodes.title: La Gran Mentira

episodes.synopsis: The hunt for Pablo seems to be over after he makes a deal with the government, but Murphy and Peña -- and the Cali Cartel -- have other plans.
episodes.title: La Catedral

episodes.synopsis: Pablo's activities in prison provoke the government into taking extreme action. Murphy and Peña face a situation of their own.
episodes.title: Despegue

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of a massive military effort to take Pablo into custody, the family reunites while enemies worry. Steve and Connie fight about safety.
episodes.title: Free at Last

episodes.synopsis: Tata gets impatient with life on the run. Pablo responds to President Gaviria's reward offer. Steve and Javier meet their new boss.
episodes.title: Cambalache

episodes.synopsis: President Gaviria has a new job for an old colleague. The Search Bloc's new tactics shake up Pablo, but also unsettle Steve and Javier.
episodes.title: Our Man in Madrid

episodes.synopsis: The Cali cartel discusses moving in on Pablo's territory. Limón proposes a plan to Maritza. Tata gets a gun for protection.
episodes.title: The Good, The Bad, and The Dead

episodes.synopsis: The Search Bloc gets a new leader. Javier loses faith in the system. Pablo brings Tata's brother Carlos down from Miami to cheer her up.
episodes.title: The Enemies of My Enemy

episodes.synopsis: The newly-formed Los Pepes want to destroy Pablo and his empire. Tata's brother urges her to leave and seek safety with her children.
episodes.title: Los Pepes

episodes.synopsis: As the danger intensifies for the Escobars, Pablo sends his family to another country. Gaviria weighs the opportunity to use them as leverage.
episodes.title: Deutschland 93

episodes.synopsis: Colombia begins to turn on Escobar after his latest terrorist attack. Tata receives help from an unlikely ally. Quica gets increasingly anxious.
episodes.title: Exit El Patrón

episodes.synopsis: Pablo is reunited with an estranged family member. Judy Moncada's life is put in danger. The DEA and CIA clash over how to handle Los Pepes.
episodes.title: Nuestra Finca

episodes.synopsis: Javier deals with the repercussions from Judy's interview. Tata tries to convince Pablo to surrender for the sake of his children.
episodes.title: Al Fin Cayó!

episodes.synopsis: The Gentlemen of Cali gather their associates together for a big surprise announcement about the future of their business.
episodes.title: The Kingpin Strategy

episodes.synopsis: A gas incident threatens to disrupt the Cali-government deal and Jorge is asked to help out. Peña grapples with his former Los Pepes connection.
episodes.title: The Cali KGB

episodes.synopsis: The Rodriguez brothers go into hiding during negotiations. Pacho meets with the Lord of the Skies in Mexico. Peña's new DEA team visits Cali.
episodes.title: Follow the Money

episodes.synopsis: Peña hatches a plan to try to capture Cali leader Gilberto Rodriguez. Amado proposes a business idea to Pacho.
episodes.title: Checkmate

episodes.synopsis: Paranoid about leaks, Miguel cracks down on his security. Pacho makes a decision about his new offer. Peña works on cultivating a witness.
episodes.title: MRO

episodes.synopsis: Jorge takes a dangerous risk. An accident in New York threatens to expose Chepe. Peña travels to Curaçao to arrest a potential witness.
episodes.title: Best Laid Plans

episodes.synopsis: Peña plans another covert operation to take down a key Cali cartel member, but he risks running out of time during his search.
episodes.title: Sin Salida

episodes.synopsis: David seeks revenge on behalf of his father, putting Enrique in danger. Peña asks Don Berna for help on a rescue mission.
episodes.title: Convivir

episodes.synopsis: David follows his suspicions. Peña is shocked to discover the depth of corruption in the Colombian government. Miguel is sought after once again.
episodes.title: Todos Los Hombres del Presidente

episodes.synopsis: David and Peña are in a race against each other to find Pallomari. Peña makes a serious decision about the future of his career.
episodes.title: Going Back to Cali
